name: ZHANG Ruiqin
education: BSc MSc PhD Shandong University, China
research interest: Member of Editorial Board of Journal of Theoretical and Computational Chemistry (JTCC) since 2007.
Member of Editorial Board of Journal of Cluster Science (for a three-year term beginning January 2014).
Member of Advisory Editorial Board of Chemical Physics (for a three-year term beginning November 2014).
Member of Editorial Board of Scientific Reports (for a two-year term beginning January 2015).
Associate Editor of Journal of Electronic Materials (for a two-year term beginning February 2015).
